name: Super Solid
description:
Immerse into world of solid colors. Yes, solid colors, no textures. Basic targets of the game are, that you must shoot all sphere-shaped enemies and colect all collectables, which are sphere-shaped too, but they have diferrent color than enemies. This game is splitted into 9 classic worlds, which have diferrent colours making them unique atmosphere comparing to each other. In each chapter is new element making the game harder. 

 Dark World is DLC world, which will test your skills in this game, but wont add any element, it's just darker, as the name says.

Now, in very first early access, just first world and first level from second world are available to play.
